name: ShowSnobDaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Are you a huge fan of HBO, FX, Starz and Netflix? Then you need the Show Snob Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on top TV shows. 

Show Snob is the TV news and opinions site brought to you by the FanSided Network. Show Snob is dedicated to providing top-notch TV news, views, and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.
